title: Ip week??!
body:
When is it ip week?!
You get like 1000 ip everygame!
Pls I need the dates!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: I've NEVER seen anything close to 1000 IP per game. Most bonus's will be lucky if you get double. There are the double weeks rarely, but generally you get X more, which is in reality not enough to hold your breath over.
No, last time I got 1000 every game I played
It depends on the weekend, i recall getting close to the 1k mark (i think it was like 800 IP) but this was back from ocean week if i recall. (and included FWotD)

i honestly seen someone win 1370 ip....

But you know... quinn.
1000? Ur crazy, should be getting more

There are sometimes IP Weekends, usually the way it works is 

The more people in your premade, the more you'll earn.

EDIT: Abuse this by joining anyone's premade group.
Usually i just play with my friends and fuck around in norms.
